sql.query: SELECT * from ( select TS, MSG_TYPE, NUM, DESCRIPTION, SOURCE, PROCESSED, CLIENT, USERNAME, ID from sphrsbilling.sys_log order by TS desc ) where rownum < :RECORD_COUNT
select TS, MSG_TYPE, NUM, DESCRIPTION, SOURCE, PROCESSED, CLIENT, USERNAME, ID from sphrsbilling.sys_log where id = :id order by TS desc

SELECT * from ( select TS, MSG_TYPE, NUM, DESCRIPTION, SOURCE, PROCESSED, CLIENT, USERNAME, ID from sphrsbilling.sys_log where DESCRIPTION = :DESCRIPTION order by TS desc ) where rownum < :RECORD_COUNT
SELECT * from ( select TS, MSG_TYPE, NUM, DESCRIPTION, SOURCE, PROCESSED, CLIENT, USERNAME, ID from sphrsbilling.sys_log where MSG_TYPE = :MSG_TYPE order by TS desc ) where rownum < :RECORD_COUNT
update sphrsbilling.sys_log set processed = sysdate where ID = :ID

select NVL(ext_sys, '{NONE}') as EXT_SYS, batch_job_type, trunc(submitted_on) as Day, TRUNC((completed_on-submitted_on)*24*60,4) as Time from SPHRSBILLING.BATCH_JOB where submitted_on > ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -1) order by ext_sys, batch_job_type, Day

select NVL(ext_sys, '{NONE}') as EXT_SYS, j.batch_job_type, JT.DESCR, MIN(J.SUBMITTED_ON) from SPHRSBILLING.BATCH_JOB j left join sphrsbilling.batch_job_type jt on jt.batch_job_type = j.batch_job_type where submitted_on > ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -1) GROUP by NVL(ext_sys, '{NONE}'), j.batch_job_type, JT.DESCR ORDER BY MIN(J.SUBMITTED_ON)

select NVL(ext_sys, '{NONE}') as EXT_SYS, batch_job_type, trunc(submitted_on) as Day, TRUNC((completed_on-submitted_on)*24*60,4) as Time from SPHRSBILLING.BATCH_JOB where submitted_on > ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -1) and NVL(ext_sys, '{NONE}') = :EXT_SYS and batch_job_type = :BATCH_JOB_TYPE order by ext_sys, batch_job_type, Day

select EXT_SYS, TO_CHAR(TAT_ENDS_ON, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as DAY, count(*) as COUNT from sphrsbilling.work_unit where TAT_ENDS_ON >= :MONTH_START and TAT_ENDS_ON < :MONTH_END group by EXT_SYS, TO_CHAR(TAT_ENDS_ON, 'yyyy-mm-dd') order by 2, 1

select ROUND(nbr_sel/ ((completed_on-submitted_on)*24*60), 0) as "Jobs per min", ROUND(((completed_on-submitted_on)*24*60)/(timespan_lt-timespan_ge), 0) as "Minutes per day", ROUND((completed_on-submitted_on)*24*60, 0) as "Run min" , (timespan_lt-timespan_ge) as "Days run", trunc(submitted_on) as "Date", b.* from sphrsbilling.batch_job b where batch_job_type = :batch_job_type and submitted_on > add_months(trunc(sysdate), -6) order by batch_job_id

select ROUND((completed_on-submitted_on)*24*60, 0) as "Run min" , trunc((timespan_lt-timespan_ge),4) as "Days run", trunc(submitted_on) as "Date", b.* from sphrsbilling.batch_job b where batch_job_type = :batch_job_type and NVL(ext_sys, '{NONE}') = NVL(:ext_sys, '{NONE}') and submitted_on > trunc(sysdate) - :days order by batch_job_id
